title: Amagi Brilliant Park: Nonbirishiteiru Hima ga Nai!
original_name: 甘城ブリリアントパーク 「のんびりしている暇がない!」
opening_song: "Extra Magic Hour (エクストラ・マジック・アワー)" by AKINO with bless4
ending_song: "Elementario de Aimashou (エレメンタリオで会いましょう)" by BRILLIANT4 [Sylphy (Tomoyo Kurosawa), Kobori (Shiori Mikami), Salama (Minami Tsuda), Muse (Yuuka Aisaka)]
sinopse: Unaired episode bundled with the seventh Blu-ray and DVD volume of Amagi Brilliant Park.
